eoinprout wrote:
> If your getting IDs from a server for use in a upcoming POST isn't the
> server maintaining "application" state for the session?
> Isn't that unRESTful.

What session?

It's giving you an ID known not to have been used before. This reflects 
upon the state of the server. There's no session.
